title: Topic 001 Question 291
body: A security engineer must use AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) to design a key management solution for a set of Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon
EBS) volumes that contain sensitive data. The solution needs to ensure that the key material automatically expires in 90 days.
options: A customer managed CMK that uses customer provided key material
A customer managed CMK that uses AWS provided key material
Operation system-native encryption that uses GnuPG
